definition: dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose

sentences.english: A magnificent gleam of triumph sprang into Cowper-wood's eye.
sentences.chinese: 柯帕伍德的眼睛裏突然透露出勝利的莊嚴的光芒來。

sentences.english: He did not give their names.
sentences.chinese: 但他沒有透露他們的名字。

sentences.english: M33: Well we can't say much about it.
sentences.chinese: 我們不能透露太多關於這些東西的信息。

sentences.english: Wikileaks.org, which published the documents, won't reveal its source.
sentences.chinese: org作爲發佈這些文件的網站，不願透露其來源。

sentences.english: The books you read tell the interviewer something about your personality.
sentences.chinese: 你讀的書和雜誌可以透露出你的個人特徵。

sentences.english: None of the auto makers disclosed a pricing strategy in Guangzhou Monday.
sentences.chinese: 週一在廣州，沒有任何汽車商透露定價策略。

sentences.english: The officer, who refused to give his name, said Fang was on his way to the airport.
sentences.chinese: 該不願透露姓名的警察表明方濱興正在趕往機場。

sentences.english: Italian agent Vincenzo Morabito says Jonathan Zebina is staying with Juventus.
sentences.chinese: 經紀人莫拉比託透露澤比納將呆在尤文。

sentences.english: Death's End. The title of the final installment gives away what is coming, but whose death?
sentences.chinese: 最終本的書名《死神永生》透露了結局，但誰的死亡？

sentences.english: The identity of the patient has not been revealed.
sentences.chinese: 這名病人的詳細身份尚未透露。

sentences.english: Confidence 'began to shake,' said a person with direct knowledge of the situation.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解具體情況的一位人士透露，信心開始發生了動搖。

sentences.english: The court adjourned with no word on the timing of a verdict, lawyers said.
sentences.chinese: 律師說，法庭休庭時並未透露何時宣判。

sentences.english: I confided my worries to Michael.
sentences.chinese: 我把我的擔心透露給了邁克爾。

sentences.english: The Italian couple in the doorway did not want to reveal their names.
sentences.chinese: 站在門廊的意大利夫婦不願透露姓名。

sentences.english: Towle declined to comment on whether the bank was a customer.
sentences.chinese: 陶勒拒絕透露該銀行是否爲公司客戶。

sentences.english: Prosecutors said Douglas had signed a plea agreement, but the details weren't disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 檢察官說他已簽了辯訴協議，但沒透露具體細節。

definition: to express/to show/to say/to state/to indicate/to mean
to reveal/to publish/to make public/to announce
to interview/to gather news/to hunt for and collect/to cover
to refer to/to speak about/to talk about
to quote/to cite/to recommend (one's friend's, associates etc)
it is said/allegedly/according to reports/or so they say
